indicator_name: Proportion of government recurrent and capital spending to sectors that disproportionately benefit women, the poor and vulnerable groups
goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals compilation of previous metadata
other_info: This, or part of this, indicator is awaiting the development of internationally established methodology and standards (classified by the UN as tier 3).
page_content: No data was sourced for this indicator
data_notice_text: This indicator was replaced following indicator changes from the United Nations 2020 Comprehensive Review.
